entry.title: How to Use Hydra to Hack Passwords – Penetration Testing Tutorial
entry.summary: Hydra is a brute-forcing tool that helps penetration testers and ethical hackers crack the passwords of network services. Hydra can perform rapid dictionary attacks against more than 50 protocols. This includes telnet, FTP, HTTP, HTTPS, SMB, databases, and several other services. entry.title: Lume SSG Handbook – How to Create a Static Blog with Lume
